message:
is there anyway to build searches where the results are presented, one at a time, but with the URL being that of the search result?
suppose I have a recipe site where I can search for recipes using ingredients. after I chose some ingredients I press SEARCH and get a result.
I want to present those results one at a time. but I don't want the URL to be something like www.cook.com/search/page=2.. I wish it would be www.cook.com/RECIPE-NAME. When I click NEXT it goest to the next search result but the URL updates to that new recipe name.
don't know if I made myself clear enough... I'm a n00b.

You need to either use session and/or do the site with ajax and actually query the results with an ajax call to server. Or you can store the whole recipe on client side and show it page by page with javascript.
Why not have ?page=2? It's consistent with /QUERY and doesn't require fancy-shmancy tricks.
